featured.text: The 2011 Nobel Peace Prize was awarded _____ to three women for the efforts they made in fighting for women’s rights.
The history of the Nobel Prize in Literature. 42.
In 1993, Morrison received the Nobel Prize in Literature.

definition.zh_def: 諾貝爾獎，表彰在物理學、化學、生理學或醫學、文學及和平等領域作出卓越貢獻的人士。
definition.en_def: A prestigious international award given annually in several categories, including Physics, Chemistry, Physiology or Medicine, Literature, and Peace, to individuals or organizations for outstanding contributions.
definition.example: Marie Curie was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics for her research on radioactivity.
